assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Hoshi Iryo-Sanki Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pharmaceutical medical oxygen and nitrous oxides in Japan. The company operates in five segments: Medical Gas-Related Business; Home Medical Care-Related Business; Medical Gas Facility Construction-Related Business; Nursing-Care and Welfare-Related Business; and Facilities and Long-Term Care Related Business. The Medical Gas-Related Business segment sells medical oxygen gas, anesthesia gas, and other medical gas. The Home Medical Care-Related Business segment rents oxygen concentrators for home oxygen therapy; and equipment for continuous positive airway pressure, home ventilators, etc. The Medical Gas Facility Construction-Related Business segment designs and constructs medical gas piping work and performs maintenance and inspection of medical gas piping equipment. The Nursing-Care and Welfare-Related Business segment offers rental and sale of long-term care and welfare-related products and equipment, home renovation, home-visit nursing, and home care support services. The Facilities and Long-Term Care Related Business segment operates pay nursing homes and outpatient long-term care facilities, as well as related operations. It also plans, manufactures, sells, maintains, inspects, and repairs medical instruments equipment for medical gas supply facilities, and nursing care equipment, as well as provides home oxygen therapy support services. In addition, the company operates in-home care support facilities, as well as provides construction management and rental of nursing care equipment. Hoshi Iryo-Sanki Co., Ltd. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
